column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi JP - Thank you again for giving us another chance to make things right for you. I'm very happy you enjoyed your visit and I greatly appreciate your very kind words. We would be nothing without our customers
column2: so it's always a pleasure and a privilege to get feedback like yours
column3: especially after having had the chance to correct a mistake. Thank you again
column4: and we look forward to serving you again soon!
